de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.evaluation.scores.adapter

Class VectorOverThreshold

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.evaluation.scores.adapter.VectorOverThreshold
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScoreEvaluation.Predicate<AbstractVectorIter>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VectorNonZero

    public class VectorOverThreshold
extends Object
implements ScoreEvaluation.Predicate<AbstractVectorIter>
    Class that uses a NumberVector as reference, and considers all non-zero values as positive entries.
    Since:
    0.7.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
